entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inefficient codegen using `for` instead of a simple `while`-loop #63544
  • ObjectDisposedException after slightly malformed POST/PUT request in HttpListener #63543
  • Minimal record definition with camel case deserialization uses Pascal Case #63542
  • The JIT generates a redudant `cmp` instruction in accessing memory by pointer #63541
    7.0.0
  • Hit inotify user limit on linux when you start and stop hosts created with Host.CreateDefaultBuilder(args) in a tight loop #63540
  • Implement `IList` interface for all (ordered) dictionary keys #63537
  • Support async NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection for synchronous pipes #63536
  • Setting thread affinity is complicated as AppDomain.GetCurrentThreadId() no longer matches ProcessThread.Id #63535
  • Allow Process.Kill to specify the exit code #63532
  • ping(6) tests are failing on FreeBSD #63530

Closed

  • RegexKnownPatternTests.TerminationInNonBacktrackingVsBackTracking Failures on Linux ARM32 #62873
  • JSON source generator emits CS0618 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #62076
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generation and records from another assembly #62374
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect translation of Ping error codes #62592
    Future
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Missing entries in user.config after decryption/encryption with ConfigurationSaveMode.Full #62233

PullRequests

Created

  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Shared physical file provider with base directory as root #63538
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • [IGNORE] debugging debugger array tests #63528
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE by making sure we always choose the right ref #63525
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Delete duplicated consts in XmlUTF8TextReader #63367
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Suppress SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success test on Windows 11 #63526
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Delete dead null check in XmlQueryRuntime.DocOrderDistinct #63371
    area-System.Xml
  • Delete a dead null check in TransactionStateDelegatedBase.EnterState #63361
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix debug-only tracing in PhysicalMemoryMonitor.SetLimit #63342
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Increase timeout on regex test #63529
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] disable tests unstable on Windows 11 #63527
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Backport build improvements, and fixes from #61581 #62757
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1543194 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    area-Single-File
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63520
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • Fixes Event Log Message Format on Unmanaged FailFast #63517
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63514
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
